summary: Crow ENB let's you experience a clear and realistic looking Skyrim featuring bright and sunny days as well as harsh snow- and rainstorms. You will get to see breathtaking nature with amazing Sunsets, Water, Sky and a lot more!
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]FIRST OF ALL: Version 2.0 to be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61896/?]here[/url]![/size][/u][/b]
SECOND OF ALL: Check out [url=http://crowclawsskyrim.blogspot.de/] my Skyrim Blog [/url] for screenshots and updates.


[u] This ENB comes in only one version by now: Everything just cranked up and giving a shit about performance [/u]
(I own a high-end rig so I didn't care about optimization)
It is based on Opethfeldts Enb.

V0_2 has been released! I took some good stuff from the Insomnia ENB (At this point I'd like to thank its author for his great work!), adjusted it and integrated it into mine. We now have a new DoF, wich is awesome btw, the picture looks a lot sharper, sky looks even more impressive and some other minor things! Check it out and endorse if you like what you see!

Performance version is here! Disabled AO, turned down quality of variant effects and techniques. Should give a bit more performance than the original version.

[b] Install [/b]
1. You guys know how to install it anyways
2. Download the file (U don't say)
3. Download v254 of the enbseries at enbdev.com
4. Copy/Paste the d3d9.dll and the enbhost of the wrapper version into your Skyrim Main folder
5. Download and put into your Skyrim Main folder the enbhelper
6. Make sure that correct Memory values are entered in the enblocal.ini
7. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini according to the instructions give on enbdev.com
8. activate the OpethTorch.esp and OpethWeather.esp as well as the ELE modules
9. (Optional) Download and install the recommended mods wich are as following:
Enhanced Lights and FX (Warm interiors)
Realistic Water Two
Dat Grass (only for kick-ass-PCs)
Unique Grass and Groundcovers
Ethernal Clouds
10. Disable CoT and RLO if you're using it!
11. Something tells me I forgot something..ah! Leave some feedback, suggestions, screenshots and maybe even an endorsement!

Troubleshooting: If you got issues, try deleting the ELE files out of your Data folder or just deactivate them in the load order

Note on feedback:
Feedback is always welcome as long as it is useful and polite! Don't be like "naah no good at all", cuz that helps literally nobody! Name issues you have with the looks of the enb and I might consider them. However, I make this for myself, so don't expect me to let it look like you want it.

One last thing: Have fun using it (I dare you not to have fun!), leave an endorsement if you like it and share some screenshots!

Credits:
Boris Vorontsov
Opethfeldt
Insomnia
Asgaard
Everyone who gave me feedback
author: CrowClaws
